content.text: Yabol Opa was a planet located within the Yabol Opa system of the Colonies.
Located along the Perlemian Trade Route, it was entirely covered by the University of Yabol Opa.
Yabol Opa joined the Galactic Republic early in its history, sometime between 25,000 BBY and 22,000 BBY.
The planet didn't secede during the Clone Wars.
The world was conquered by the Yuuzhan Vong during their invasion around 27 ABY.

elements.text: Inside the Worlds of Star Wars: Attack of the Clones
Star Wars: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook
